problem.p: Our peer assessment implementation supports distribution mechanism, which favors the submissions of participants who themselves have already written reviews. Which of the following statements is true in this context?

checkboxgroup.label: distribution mechanism
checkboxgroup.choice: The submissions of participants who have already written reviews, have a higher priority in receiving reviews.
The submissions of participants who have already written reviews receive additional points.
Participants who do not write reviews will never receive reviews.
Participants who do not write reviews will not receive points for their submission.

problem.p: Note: Make sure you select all of the correct optionsâ€”there may be more than one!

div.p: The submissions of participants who have already written reviews will not receive additional points per se.
There is a possibility to earn additional points for reviews if the reviewed participant gives the review a good rating.
Even if a participant does not write reviews at all s/he has a good chance to receive sufficient reviews; however, s/he will not receive any points at all from the system.
